arts.ttl: Graham Potter praises West Ham's performance despite 2-1 Liverpool loss
arts.sum: Potter lauds West Ham's effort, highlighting second-half surge and missed chances. He credits Liverpool's intensity, noting the challenge of controlling the ball, and praises Kudus.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah stars again as Liverpool move closer to Premier League title
arts.sum: The Reds are 13 points clear of Arsenal with six games remaining.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-1 West Ham: Virgil van Dijk scores late winner moments after Andy Robertson own goal as Reds move to within six points of the title
arts.sum: IAN LADYMAN AT ANFIELD: Liverpool only need another six points to guarantee their second Premier League title after beating West Ham at at home on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Premier League issue statement as VAR stands ground with Liverpool decision vs West Ham
arts.sum: Leading 1-0 after Luis Diaz's first-half goal, Premier League leaders Liverpool thought they should have had a penalty during the second half of their clash with West Ham at Anfield

arts.ttl: Watch Mohamed Salah break Premier League record with stunning assist in Liverpool vs. West Ham
arts.sum: Liverpool's Mohamed Salah breaks the record for the most goal involvements in a 38-game Premier League season with a stunning assist for Luis Diaz against West Ham.
